children.text: Our suppliers are reporting a 95% drop in the volume of processing related errors.

REKKI connect has been shown to reduce the number of processing related errors because over time, it captures all the different ways in which customers call a certain product, even if ambiguous. Let's do a quick calculation.
A typical error in delivery costs the company
The cost to the business when an error occurs such as 2nd Deliveries, restocking, admin.
Lets assume some error rate in your current operation:
Percentage of errors that happen in the business
Now, not all errors are processing related. Some are driver/picking mistakes. So lets assume a % of deliveries caused by human error at processing:
Amount of errors that are attributable to processing errors
Amount of errors that are attributable to processing errors

due to increased accuracy.  Altogether, the monthly savings from processing
Welcome to the Cost Comparison tool. This area is hidden from the client but you can use it to configure your document.
This is the amount of orders you assume a processor can do per month.
If the client says he employs more or less staff, this is the number you can change to alter the performance of their team.

OfferPrice (x) = match {
  x  > 0 and x <= 1K: £1.2 per order
  x > 1k and x <= 5k: £1.08 per order
  x > 5k and x <= 10k: £0.96 per order
 x > 10k and x  <= 20k: £0.8 per order
  true: £0.7 per order
}
